concept.title: Self driving cars
concept.shortdesc: Self driving cars, also known as a driverless car, is a vehicle that is capable of sensing the environment and moving safely with little or no human involvement

section.title: Technical Challenges
section.p: There are many systems that help the self driving car control the car There are systems that currently need improvement such as car navigation systems and location systems
